name: feedcord
description: FeedCord is a tool that forwards RSS feed updates into Discord channels. It lets users subscribe to feeds and customize delivery, acting as a self-hosted bridge between websites and Discord servers.
features: Discord Integration: Forward RSS feeds to Discord channels, Customizable delivery, Real-time updates. Stay informed in Discord.
Feed Management: Subscribe to multiple sources. Centralized control.
Notification Customization: Format and filter messages. Tailored alerts.
Self-Hosted Bridge: Connect websites to Discord. Privacy-focused automation.
Multiple Channels: Route feeds to different channels. Organized notifications.
Embed Formatting: Rich Discord embeds. Beautiful messages.
Filter Rules: Control what gets posted. Relevant content only.
Webhook Support: Easy Discord integration. Simple setup.
Update Frequency: Configure check intervals. Balanced notifications.
